title: Will Obama Be Able To Keep His Promise Of Closing Guantanamo Bay?
teaser: It's been 13 years since the first detainees arrived at Guantanamo Bay. NPR's Arun Rath talks to Miami Herald's Carol Rosenberg about the likelihood it closing before Obama ends his term.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
